Together, we form a bond that cannot be broken, a bond of blood and sacrifice that strengthens our resolve and solidifies our faith.

Our deity demands absolute loyalty, and we must be willing to surrender our earthly attachments, our fears, and our doubts. I remind my fellow cult members that the rewards are immeasurable, that the bliss of the afterlife awaits those who prove themselves worthy.
